arts.ttl: Burnley vs Sunderland: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 2, 2025
arts.sum: After last week’s dramatic return, the Premier League’s action continues as Burnley welcome Sunderland to Turf Moor in a clash between two teams who are making their return to England’s top division. Momentum is difficult to establish in the Premier League, and even though the season has just started, both teams will know the significance of this game for their hopes of survival.
